channel.title: Butter Princess - GFC Froghemoth One-Shot
channel.description:
*****This session is scheduled as part of the Froghemoth Game Facilitator Camp. Please do not sign up if you are not one of the Froghemoths*****
It's time for the Minnesota State Fair, and for the first time in 3 years another Princess Kay of the Milky Way will be crowned. Her likeness is immortalized in 90 pounds of butter, and you are here to steal it! But to do that, you must enter the mass of teeming humanity and wretched excess that is the State Fair.
No prior knowledge of the game is necessary, rules will be taught during the session.
**CW: Weird Horror**
**System** : Trophy Dark
**Duration** : One four hour session
**Breaks** : Short (5-10 min) breaks on the hour
**Venue** : GM’s Zoom
**Recording** : No
**Safety** : Lines & Veils, X-card, and open-door policy. This game will follow the [Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html).
https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-N8fZY_c7b0TSHg_o7Kh
